headline: President Trump’s political enemies spied on him in the White House, DOJ investigator says
sentences:
In doing so, Tech Executive-1 indicated that he was seeking to please certain ‘VIPs,’ referring to individuals at Law Firm-1 and the Clinton Campaign.”

“The question now is whether anyone will be held accountable.”

The good news is, everybody is talking about not only this atrocity against our Nation, but that the press refuses to even mention the major crime that took place.”

“Trump & Fox are desperately spinning up a fake scandal to distract from his real ones.

The more his misdeeds are exposed, the more they lie,” she tweeted, offering an article from left-wing Vanity Fair as “a good debunking of their latest nonsense.”
The article is titled “You’ll Never Believe It But Hillary Clinton Did Not, In Fact, Spy On Trump’s White House,” and its subhead reads, “In less breaking news, Donald Trump remains a moron.”

Everyone’s got a role.”
